attributes.action: Urge the Bulgarian government to raise the standard of social care in orphanages.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am to protest against the standrads of social care in Bulgarian orphanages & lives of vulnerable children being in danger at the hands of negelectful & abusive staff.Having watched BBC4's "Bulgaria's Abandoned Children" in an instituition called "Mogilino" where the children were malnourished,left alone most of the day,usually on their potties,never ever taken out to see the sunlight or fresh air,left in pain without medical attention,rocking back & forth all day with no-one to protect or care for them.These children have not only been traumatized by being abandoned by their mothers & fathers with NO-ONE in this world but no rights,not even having proper food(only bread&baby cereal),which in an European country is shocking.The Bulgarian Helsinki Committe,a Non-governmental organization promoting human rights in Bulgaria have pressured their government vehemently but have been ignored.Prime Minister,please donot ignore this plea & take immidiate actions as this cruelty & inhumanity is a direct act against God & must NOT be ignored as it is a big sin.
